import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.scss'] }) export class AboutComponent { }
About Me
Profile
I'm a Frontend Web Developer building the Front-end of Websites and Web Applications that leads to the success of the overall product.

I am experienced in developing web and desktop applications including full front end design. I’ve also worked on hybrid applications of some of the most trending mutual funds in India. I'm open to Job opportunities where I can contribute, learn and grow. If you have a good opportunity that matches my skills and experience then don't hesitate to contact me.

Email : sushmashenoy1997@gmail.com

Phone: +1 4088587555
